_source.text: 5 1965 UCLA After three straight second-place finishes to rival USC, UCLA senior Arthur Ashe swept the NCAA singles and doubles (with Ian Crookenden) titles to help the Bruins to the largest margin of victory under the old tournament format - 18 points better than second-place Miami.

text: 5 1965 UCLA After three straight second-place finishes to rival USC, UCLA senior **Arthur** **Ashe** swept
the NCAA singles and doubles (with **Ian** **Crookenden**) titles to help the Bruins to the largest margin
of victory under the old tournament format - 18 points **better** **than** second-place Miami.
